channel.title: Godsword Stances Error
channel.description: I added the godsword stances and downloaded the 74.dat and put that in my anims folder, and compiled. Here is what I get: http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/194/capturefiw.png/ http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/163/capture2to.png/ http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/51/capture3mc.png/ http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/502/capture4gs.png/ PLZ HELP!

item.title: Godsword Stances Error
item.dc:creator: @24man30 24man30
item.description:
@24man30 wrote:

[quote=“dylan.hurley, post:10, topic:425557”][quote author=Kayceee link=topic=528218.msg3866262#msg3866262 date=1325026078]
Animations are client sided I do believe…
[/quote]
The anims are their
making object use correct anims is server sided I think
Edit: if normal 2h works just search for them and add gs’s underneath[/quote] All 2 hands are on shoulder

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword Stances Error
item.dc:creator: @24man30 24man30
item.description:
@24man30 wrote:

[quote=“teh war of noobs, post:5, topic:425557”]Search in Client.java:

You should see something like this:

[code]public int GetWepAnim(int id)
{
if(id == -1) // unarmed
{
return 422;
}
if(id == 837)
{
return 1084;
}
if(id == 3190 || id == 3192 || id == 3194 || id == 3196 || id == 3198 || id== 3200 || id == 3202 || id == 3204) // halberds
{
return 440;
}
if(id == 4170 || id == 4675)
{
return 414;
}
if(id == 4151) // whip
{
return 1658;
}
if(id == 7900) // claws
{
return 3998;
}
if(id == 6528)
{
return 2661;
}
if(id == 4827)
{
return 426;
}
if(id == 6522)
{
return 3353;
}
if((id == 1291 || id == 1321 || id == 1323 || id == 1325 || id == 1327 || id == 1329 || id == 6611 || id == 1327 || id == 1321 || id == 1333 || id == 1305 || id== 6739 || id == 4587) && FightType != 3) // scimitars
{
return 451;
}
if((id == 1291 || id == 1321 || id == 1323 || id == 1325 || id == 1327 || id == 1329 || id == 6611 || id == 1327 || id == 1321 || id == 1333 || id == 1305 || id== 6739 || id == 4587) && FightType == 3) // scimitars
{
return 412;
}
if(id == 841 || id == 843 || id == 845 ||id == 849 ||id == 847 ||id == 853 || id == 851 || hasCrystalBow() || id == 859 || id == 861)
{
return 426;
}
if(id == 837)
{
return 427;
}
if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100 || id == 1309 || id == 1307 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 6609 )
{
return 3496;
}
if(id == 4153) // maul
{
return 1665;
}
if(id == 1377) // dragon b axe
{
return 1833;
}
if(id == 4718 && FightType != 3) // dharoks axe
{
return 2067;
}
if(id == 4718 && FightType == 3) // dharoks axe
{
return 2066;
}
if(id == 4726) // guthans spear
{
return 2080;
}
if(id == 4747) // torags hammers
{
return 2068;
}
if(id == 4755) // veracs flail
{
return 2062;
}
if(id == 4734) // karils x bow
{
return 2075;
}
if((id == 1215 || id == 1231 || id == 5680 || id == 5698) && FightType != 3) // dragon daggers
{
return 402;
}
if((id == 1215 || id == 1231 || id == 5680 || id == 5698) && FightType == 3) // dragon daggers
{
return 395;
}
if(id == 6609 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 6609 || id == 7158)
// 2 handers
{
return 407;
}
else
{
return 451;
}
}
public int GetRunAnim(int id)
{
if(id == 837)
{
return 2251;
}
if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 6609)
{
return 306;
}
if(id == 7900)
{
return 824;
}
if(id == 4084)
{
return 1468;
}
if(id == 4151) // whip
{
return 1661;
}
if(id == 6818)
{
return 1765;
}
if(id == 7158 || id == 1319 || id == 6609)
{
return 2563;
}
if(id == 4734) // karils x bow
{
return 2077;
}
if(id == 6528) // maul
{
return 1664;
}
if(id == 4153) // maul
{
return 1664;
}
else
{
return 0x338;
}
}

public int GetWalkAnim(int id)
{
if(id == 837)
{
return 2258;
}
if(id == 4084)
{
return 1468;
}
if(id == 6528) // dharoks axe
{
return 2064;
}
if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 6609)
{
return 306;
}
if(id == 4718) // dharoks axe
{
return 2064;
}
if(id == 4039 || id == 4037 || id == 1379 || id == 3204 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 1403 || id == 145 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4675 || id == 4710 || id == 6526 || id == 4726 || id == 6562 || id == 6563 || id == 6914 || id == 5730) // staves + d long and most other weps with str8 up emote
{
return 1146;
}
if(id == 7158 || id == 1319 || id == 6609)
{
return 2562;
}
if(id == 4565) // basket of eggs
{
return 1836;
}
if(id == 4755) // veracs flail
{
return 2060;
}
if(id == 4734) // karils x bow
{
return 2076;
}
if(id == 4153) // maul
{
return 1663;
}
if(id == 4718) // 2h + gr8 axe
{
return 1662;
}
if(id == 4151) // whip
{
return 1660;
}
else
{
return 0x333;
}
}

public int GetStandAnim(int id)
{
if(id == 837)
{
return 2257;
}
if(id == 8896)
{
return 5869;
}
if(id == 4084)
{
return 1462;
}
if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 6609)
{
return 301;
}
if(id == 7158 || id == 1319 || id == 6609)
{
return 2561;
}
if(id == 4755) // veracs flail
{
return 2061;
}
if(id == 4734) // karils x bow
{
return 2074;
}
if(id == 4153) // maul
{
return 1662;
}
if(id == 6528)//Obby Maul
{
return 0x811;
}
if(id == 4565) // basket of eggs
{
return 1836;
}
if(id == 1305 || id == 11962 || id == 11963 || id == 10395 || id == 11964 || id == 11965 || id == 1379 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 1403 || id == 145 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 6914 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4675 || id == 4710 || id == 6526 || id == 4726 || id == 6562 || id == 6563 || id == 5730 || id == 3190 || id == 3192 || id == 3194 || id == 3196 || id == 3198 || id == 3200 || id == 3202 || id == 3204 || id == 772) // staves
{
return 809;
}
else
{
return 0x328;
}
}[/code]
Ok, now look for something like this:

{ return 427;

Underneath, add your godsword ids.

Now look for something like this:

Underneath, add your godsword ids.

Now look for something like this:

Underneath, add your godsword ids.

Now look for something like this:

Underneath, add your godsword ids. And you are done! hope this helped.[/quote] Yea, but where do I put the rest of them, Like Run anim and walk anim and stand anim and block anim?

Read full topic

{
return 0x811;
}
if(id == 4565) // basket of eggs
{
return 1836;
}
if(id == 1305 || id == 11962 || id == 11963 || id == 10395 || id == 11964 || id == 11965 || id == 1379 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 1403 || id == 145 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 6914 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4675 || id == 4710 || id == 6526 || id == 4726 || id == 6562 || id == 6563 || id == 5730 || id == 3190 || id == 3192 || id == 3194 || id == 3196 || id == 3198 || id == 3200 || id == 3202 || id == 3204 || id == 772) // staves
{
return 809;
}
else
{
return 0x328;
}
}[/code]
Ok, now look for something like this:

{ return 427;

Underneath, add your godsword ids.
